summary: SEVERE HESITATION PROBLEMS ON SEVERAL OCCATIONS AS I WAS ACCELERATING.  TOOK IT TO THE DEALER THREE TIMES.  THEY WERE UNABLE TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM, BECAUSE THEY WERE NOT ABLE TO REPRODUCE THE SAME PROBLEM.  JANUARY 2003 THE CAR WOULD NOT START.  I HAD IT TOWED TO THE DEALERSHIP.  I HAD TO REPLACE THE FUEL PUMP $440.  MILEAGE ON THE VEHICLE WAS 48,000.  I WAS HAVING THE HESTIATION DIFFICULTIES DURING THE WARRENTY PERIOD.
